languages.text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 stack is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:

If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text:
Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, расход 1 заряда предотвращает этот урон.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, расход 1 заряда предотвращает этот урон.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.

Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, расход 1 заряда предотвращает этот урон.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, se elimina 1 carga de este efecto para evitar el daño.
Si no quedan cargas, el daño no se evita y el portador queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} hasta que termine el combate.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, se elimina 1 carga de este efecto para evitar el daño.
Si no quedan cargas, el daño no se evita y el portador queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} hasta que termine el combate.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、そのダメージを防ぐためにこの効果のチャージが1つ消費される。
チャージが残っていない場合、ダメージを防ぐことができず、使用者は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ状態{/g}となる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、そのダメージを防ぐためにこの効果のチャージが1つ消費される。
チャージが残っていない場合、ダメージを防ぐことができず、使用者は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ状態{/g}となる。

languages.text:
每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，失去1层此效果层数，将承受的伤害无效化。
当装备者失去所有“全息投影”层数之后，阻挡伤害的效果消失，且装备者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，失去1层此效果层数，将承受的伤害无效化。
当装备者失去所有“全息投影”层数之后，阻挡伤害的效果消失，且装备者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, 1 cumul de cet effet est consommé pour l'en prémunir.
Une fois les cumuls épuisés, les dégâts ne sont plus annulés et le personnage subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, 1 cumul de cet effet est consommé pour l'en prémunir.
Une fois les cumuls épuisés, les dégâts ne sont plus annulés et le personnage subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
Erleidet der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wird 1 Ladung dieses Effektes entfernt, um diesen Schaden zu verhindern.
Sind alle Ladungen verbraucht, wird kein Schaden mehr Verhindert und der Träger wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of this effect is removed to prevent that damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Erleidet der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wird 1 Ladung dieses Effektes entfernt, um diesen Schaden zu verhindern.
Sind alle Ladungen verbraucht, wird kein Schaden mehr Verhindert und der Träger wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} belegt.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} her maruz kaldığında bu hasarı önlemek için bu etkinin 1 şarjı ortadan kalkar.
Hiç kullanım hakkı kalmazsa hasar artık önlenemez ve kullanan kişi {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g}. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:

If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat.
